fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives:
EU-Diaspora dialogue/partnership 
Europe for Citizens Program 
EU Delegation to the Philippines 
Migration and Integration
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
To provide an effective forum for regional and global interaction between and among Filipino organizations within Europe. 
 
To promote integration in Europe and sustained concern and support to the Philippines in the form of development projects or investments. 
 
To empower the Filipino diaspora to think and act glocally (global and local) to be a potential and active contributor to the development the home country, the Philippine and the host countries in Europe. 
 
To promote commonality of goals among Filipino migrants and Filipino descents in Europe as well as with other migrants and European social groups. 
 
To initiate projects enabling Filipinos overseas to be effective contributors towards sustainable personal economic welfare and in the process become active participants in both host- and home-country development goals. 
 
As a European network of Filipino organisations all over Europe, we want ENFiD to have a committee to study the relevant migrant- and development related policies of EU and of the Philippines; design activities or programs which would be relevant to the development and integration of Filipino migrants in Europe; and disseminate information regarding the EU to our membership. This way we could bring Europe closer to the Filipino migrants. When necessary we would also want to forward recommendations to the EU regarding policy lines on migration and development.   
 
ENFiD also aspires to look into the policy lines regarding migration and development in EU and in the Philippines. We want to be able to identify if there is a gap between policies and implementation and where necessary, to forward recommendations to respective agencies.
relevant_communication:
Intervention at the Strategic Meeting with Diaspora organized by the EU DEVCO on 23 March 2018.
